artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Kyokutei Bakin; Publisher: Tōkyō Haishi Shuppansha; Carver: Noguchi Enkatsu
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: burnt-orange cover; four pages of images at beginning of book: gruff, hairy figure holding fan and staff, looking down at birds; mask-like, ogre face in sky above man sleeping with fan; withered elderly figure with child wrapping a severed head with cloth on pike; woman balancing wooden barrel on head holding gourd from wooden sword; pages of text
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From The Crescent Moon (Chinsetsu yumiharizuki 椿説弓張月)
title: The Crescent Moon, vol. 9
